nodes.text: The Fa'athra clan was a Hutt clan, or kajidic, of the Hutt Cartel. One of its members was the Hutt Voontara, a crime lord on Nal Hutta. The Fa'athra clan had members that had quarrels with those of the Nem'ro clan.

While the Fa'athra kajidic itself has not been mentioned, its existence is implied by the name of Voontara Fa'athra. According to Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, the cuirvas of a Hutt identified their clan. Its existence as a clan and criminal organization is also supported by the fact that the phrase, "Fa'athra Clan" is commonly used in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
